t: MF Grimm/MF Doom [Vinyl] - Amazon.com Music
s: Was lucky enough to find a brand new original pressing of this on vinyl, if you can get a hold of it on any format from anywhere you know you'd better start looking! Grimm flows like water, to steal a lyric, and doom just seems like he's long since lost the last of his proverbial marbles.

t: MF DOOM Vinyl Records & CDs For Sale
s: Daniel Dumile, best known by his stage name MF DOOM or simply DOOM, was a British-American rapper and record producer. He began his career in 1988 as a member of KMD, performing as Zev Love X.

t: MF Doom - MF Doom: Operation Doomsday Vinyl 2LP - Amazon.com Music
s: The whole album has so many great tracks, and one of the coolest things is the skits. The are taken from a Stan Lee type comic book series. It's just such a vintage feel to it, and you get excited for the general story behind it. I am not an MF Doom fan in general so my opinion is unbiased.

t: r/mfdoom on Reddit: I got the Mm..FOOD vinyl from amazon and in it was a stencil of the villain’s mask. Two weeks before it happened I was planning to make a stencil and before I could make one the villain himself gave me one. Now I am going around the streets of Tbilisi, Georgia putting his Metal Face for all to see
